ABOUT_1:
INDA KOWA ZAI IYA LADA GA ABUN CIKI
inda kowa zai iya lada ga abun ciki!
ABOUT_2:
AN KARFAFA DA {{DANDAMALINSUNA}} DANDAMALI. APP AKA HALITTA DA
An karfafa da {{dandamalisuna}} dandamali. App aka halitta da
ABOUT_3: kuma shi ne bude-source, jama'a kore mobile aikin. Yana yayi abun ciki hanya ga karatu, nuna ra'ayi, zabe, aika rubuce rubuce, canja wurin albashi, da dai sauransu fasali miƙa ta {{dandamalinsuna}} blockchain da {{sunanfage}}.
ABOUT_4: 1. App taba samun dama ko riƙe uwa mai amfani kudi.
ABOUT_5: 2. App yayi wani abokin ciniki-gefe tsaro abin kwatanci, da masu zaman kansu makulli shirya gida, kuma bai taba aika wa da wani sabobin.
ABOUT_6: 3. App yayi sauki, m mai amfani musaya da kuma gogewa.
ABOUT_7: 4. App taba bukatar masu amfani don shigar da wani bayanin sirri.
ABOUT_8: Zabe mai kyau-Karma a matsayin shaida
POST_1: Doke shi gefen hagun ra'ayi kaga zažužžukan
POST_2: Latsa kan ra'ayi ka ga ra'ayoyi
NOTHING_HERE: Babu wani abu dai a nan, duk da haka ...
PROFILE_1: {{sunadandalin}}, cinikayya ko tsõkaci da za a iya canjawa wuri a kowane lokaci. {{Dandalinsuna}} iya tuba zuwa {{karfindandali}} in wani tsari da ake kira powering up.
PROFILE_2: {{ikondandali}}, shine tasirin tsõkaci cewa aikatãwa karfin iko ga rike dogon lokaci da kuma 'yancin kada kuri'a a matsayi. Mai yawan ikodandali shine zai iya tasiri kan sauran ta sakamakonsu, kuma la'ada ga ingantancen zabe.
PROFILE_3: Alamu daraja game da {{dandamali naúrar}} na {{sunandandali}}.
PROFILE_4: darajar kiyasta ta dogara ne a kan wasu ranaku bakwai (7) talakawan darajar {{sunandandali}}.
PROFILE_5: Makulin matsayi shine ake amfani da dashi wajen aika rubuce rubuce da 'yancin kada kuri'a. Ya kamata a bambance tsakanin ma'aikaci da mai makulin mallaka.
PROFILE_6: Owner key shi ne master key ga asusunka da kuma ake bukata don canja sauran makuli. Makuli masu zaman kansu ko kalmar sirri ga mai shi ya kamata a kiyaye aboye ta a offline kamar yadda zai yiwu.
PROFILE_7: Ma'aikacin makuli ana anfani dasune wajan canja wuri da wurin umarni a ciki kasuwa.
PROFILE_8: Makulin Wasika dasu ake anfani wajen haifarwa da karanta wasika wato memos.
PIN_TEXT:
tsarin fin yana taimakawa wajen tsran app da data, data.
Note: zarar sa, kana da adadi hudu 4 yayi kokarin buše, idan ka manta fin ko kasa, app zai cire a ciki bayanan mai amfani. Za ka iya sake shiga da kuma ci gaba ta amfani da app.
VOTE_TEXT:
Za ka samu sanarwar lokacin da wani ya zabi abunka !
Note: Fadakarwa hada rumfunan zaɓen nauyi da a jijjiga saƙo. (ko daga hannu-kuri'a, Kassa da hannu-kuri'a, ko ba-zaben).
COMMENT_TEXT:
Za ka samu sanarwar lokacin da wani ya yi sharhi a kan your posts ko tsokaci!
Note: Fadakarwa hada lokacin da wani ya gyararrakin m comments da.
FOLLOW_TEXT: Za ka samu sanarwar lokacin da wani ya bi ko ya fasa bin'ka!
MENTIONS_TEXT: Za ka samu sanarwar a yayin da wani ya ambace ka a matsayin sa ko cikin tsokacin sa!
RESTEEM_TEXT: Za ka samu sanarwar lokacin da wani ya zafafa matsayin'ka!
VOTING_TEXT:
Mahimancin kur'a ko yawan rinjayar da ikon kada kuri'u a app, don haka za ka iya tsara kyauta sakamako zabe .
Note: Wannan zai canja 'yancin kada kuri'a nauyi / kaso ga downvoting da kuma ko a ko'ina a kan app
LOGIN_1: Shigar da sunanka da kuma kalmar sirri don ci gaba.
LOGIN_2: Posting key da shi ake amfani ayi tsokaci, zabe, bi da matsayi
LOGIN_3: Active key da shi ake amfani dan canja wuri da hoton rabi fuska a karshe.
LOGIN_4: Takardun shaidarka/ki ana sawa a kan na'urar. Bayan ka/kin fice takardun shaidarka ana cirewane!
MASTER_PASS: Mai Gida/ Ainihin kalmar bada izinin wucewa
TITLE: Matsayi
REBLOG_TEXT: Resteem ne babu ja, kaza ka so ka ci gaba?
LOGIN_FAIL: Shiga yayi angulu! Don Allah ka tabbata ka shiga ciki tare da babbar kalmar sirri ko ka samar da mabudin matsayi masu zaman kansu wajan shiga idan kun zabi kwararriyar hanya.
LOGIN_FAIL_A: Shiga ya yi angulu! Dan Allah a tabbata a nemi shiga ciki da babbar kalmar sirri ko makuli sirri maiyi na mutum kansa wajen shiga idan an zabi kwararriyar hanya.
DIRECT_LINK_PICTURE: tsayayar hanyar yanar gizo ga hoto
DELETE_COMMENT: komawa ga ra'ayi/tsokaci da ake sharewa baya iyuwa
PASSWORD_INCORRECT: Kalmar sirri ko sunnan budewa ba daidai ba ne
QR_TEXT: Sanya sirrin fassaha cikin yankin daukar hoto
BALANCE_TEXT: Tabbatar ka/ki na da isasshen kudin ma'amala!
NONEXIST_USER: Ka/ki na neman makarkata wa kudin da ba ya wanzu!
TRANSFER_TEXT: Ka/kin tabbatar ka/ki na bukatar makarkata?
FLAGGING_TEXT:
Flagging a post can remove rewards and make this material less visible.

The flag should be used for the following:
  • Fraud or Plagiarism
  • Hate Speech or Internet Trolling
  • Intentional miscategorized content or Spam
REQUEST_LIMIT_TEXT: Request limit reached. Check out other trend/tags!
ACTIVE_KEY_REQUIRED_TEXT: Please provide Active private key if you have chosen Advanced login mode!
RESET_PICTURE_TEXT: This will reset user profile picture
RESET_COVER_PICTURE_TEXT: This will reset user cover picture
LANGUAGES_TEXT: Here you can change language of the app.
LOGIN_TO_X: This operation requires user to be logged in with main password, active/posting key. Please login and try again.
NO_IMAGE: You have not uploaded any image, yet!
CHAIN_TEXT: Here you can change blockchain or default platform.
CURRENCY_TEXT: Here you can change your default currency. You will see post/comment reward value in this currency.
ABOUT_11:
Feature list
- Access unique articles in any subject you are interested reading.
- Engage with authors by commenting, discussing topics.
- Voting for posts to reward author as well as earn curation reward.
- Publish your articles, blog posts and host them for free and earn rewards by engaging and gain followers.
- Write articles on go, save multiple drafts of the post for later publication.
- Bookmark favorite articles to read later.
- Exchange or cash out your earnings.
- Send your funds to any authors or users, friends, followers, etc.
- Follow interesting authors, bloggers.
- Search your followers and authors you are following.
- Get notifications to stay in touch with your followers and discussions you are involved in.
- Search for interesting tags/categories of articles, authors.
- Personalize your profile.
- Many more features to come.

Security
1. App never access or hold onto user funds.
2. App offer a client-side security model, with private keys hosted locally and never sent to any servers, you are responsible to backing up your passwords.
3. App offers simple, attractive user interfaces and experiences
4. App offers extra layer of security with pin-code

eSteem supports Steem and Golos platforms.
